Urdefhan hunters serve as their cults' trappers, hunters, and poachers. Many urdefhan hunters use [skavelings](/Monsters.aspx?ID=803) to traverse the massive caverns of the Darklands and scout for prey. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 [Urdefhan Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=878) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 82 **Perception** +26; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +25 **Str** +4 **Dex** +6 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +1 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ with 50 arrows, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [rhoka sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=120)_ --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +20 **Ref** +26 **Will** +23 **HP** 190 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects (except necrotic decay), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Weaknesses** positive 12 **Necrotic Decay** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 5-foot emanation around the body. This gas deals 12d6 negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (DC 32 basic Fortitude save). --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _rhoka sword_ +24 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 2d8+10 slashing **Melee** jaws +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d6+10 piercing plus wicked bite **Ranged** _composite longbow_ +26 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d8+4 piercing **Divine Innate Spells** DC 29, attack +23 - **3rd** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) (at will; self only), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **4th** [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) **Deadly Aim** ([Open](/Traits.aspx?ID=123)) The urdefhan hunter makes a ranged Strike at a –2 penalty. The urdefhan deals 4 additional damage with this Strike. **Double Shot** **Requirement** The urdefhan hunter is wielding a ranged weapon with [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254); **Effect** The urdefhan hunter makes two Strikes with the required weapon at a single target. These Strikes both count toward the urdefhan's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until both attacks are resolved. **Mounted Bow Expert** Urdefhan hunters can make composite longbow Strikes while mounted. **Wicked Bite** **Requirements** The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action; **Effect** The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a DC 32 Fortitude save. If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.
  • **Drain Blood** The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and the urdefhan regains 5 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's drained 2 and the urdefhan regains 10 HP).
  • **Drain Vitality** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 hour on a failed save (or enfeebled 2 for 1 hour on a critical failure).
name: Urdefhan Hunter
